original_text:
“There are those who rebel against the light,
    who are not acquainted with its ways,
    and do not stay in its paths.
korean_text: 또 광명을 배반하는 사람들은 이러하니 그들은 그 도리를 알지 못하며 그 길에 머물지 아니하는 자라

sentences.original_text: There are those who rebel against the light
who are not acquainted with its ways
and do not stay in its paths.
